0:
echo port=$DNSMASQ__PORT > /etc/dnsmasq/dnsmasq.conf && \
echo address=$DNSMASQ__ADDRESS >> /etc/dnsmasq/dnsmasq.conf && \
echo user=$DNSMASQ__USER >> /etc/dnsmasq/dnsmasq.conf && \
echo group=$DNSMASQ__GROUP >> /etc/dnsmasq/dnsmasq.conf && \
echo "log-queries" >> /etc/dnsmasq/dnsmasq.conf && \
cat /etc/dnsmasq/dnsmasq.conf

for i in $(seq 1 6); do
  psql \
    --host=postgresql-rw \
    --dbname=lemmy \
    --username=lemmy \
    --command="DELETE FROM received_activity WHERE published < NOW() - INTERVAL '14 days';" \
  && exit \
  || sleep 5
done
exit 1

devices:
  - name: canon-mp620
    groups:
      - usb:
          - vendor: 04a9
            product: 172f
  - name: zigbee
    groups:
      - paths:
          - path: /dev/serial/by-id/usb-Texas_Instruments_XDS110__03.00.00.20__Embed_with_CMSIS-DAP_L1100C4M-if00
  - name: zwave
    groups:
      - paths:
          - path: /dev/serial/by-id/usb-0658_0200-if00
